title: Software Development Engineer 1
description:
**Job Overview**
 Assists with the design/development of software solutions requiring general domain knowledge and limited business expertise.
   

  

 Troubleshoots code issues and continuously evolves IQVIA's platforms to meet user requirements/needs.
   

  

**Essential Functions**
* Assists with the design/development of software solutions requiring general domain knowledge and limited business experience.
* Works at all layers of the application stack including front\\-end user interface and backend development.
* Troubleshoots code issues and evolves IQVIA's platforms to meet user requirements/needs.
* Participates in the review of functional specifications and other validation deliverables as assigned.
* Develops an introductory understanding of industry and IQVIA\\-specific quality standards.
* Supports small development projects based on specific instructions and with limited discretion.
* Typically requires no prior relevant experience.


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor's Degree Computer Science of Engineering or equivalent in experience Req
* Experience in object\\-oriented languages like Java, PHP, Ruby, or Python and the fundamental principles of object\\-oriented principles.
* Experience in website development with HTML, CSS and JavaScript. React and NodeJS experience is a bonus.
* Understanding of relational databases and experience with basic SQL queries desired but not required.


 IQVIA is a leading global provider of clinical research services, commercial insights and healthcare intelligence to the life sciences and healthcare industries. We create intelligent connections to accelerate the development and commercialization of innovative medical treatments to help improve patient outcomes and population health worldwide. Learn more at https://jobs.iqvia.com

title: Full Stack Web Developer Intern
description:
**Full Stack Web Developer Intern (Paid)** 




**Company:** 
 Dexter's Tech
 **Location:** 
 Remote
 **Duration:** 
 3 Months
 **Application Deadline:** 
 02nd January
 **2026 Opportunity:** 
 Potential full\\-time role based on performance \\+ Internship Certificate
 



**About Dexter's Tech** 
 Dexter's Tech provides students and graduates with practical learning opportunities, hands\\-on experience, and career growth in
 **full\\-stack web development** 
 through real\\-world, industry\\-oriented projects.
 



**Role Overview** 
 As a
 **Full Stack Web Developer Intern** 
 , you'll work on live projects while gaining hands\\-on experience in both
 **front\\-end** 
 and
 **back\\-end** 
 development. This internship will enhance your technical skills and prepare you for a professional career in web development.
 



**Responsibilities** 



* Design, code, and modify websites for functionality, performance, and visual appeal.
* Develop responsive and dynamic web pages and applications.
* Test, debug, and optimize code to ensure a seamless user experience.
* Work with modern full\\-stack development tools and frameworks.
* Collaborate with senior developers and teams on real\\-world assignments.



**Requirements** 



* Currently enrolled in or recently graduated from a relevant degree/program.
* Proficiency in
 **HTML, CSS, and JavaScript** 
 .
* Familiarity with frameworks such as
 **React, Angular, Node.js, or Express.js** 
 (preferred).
* Strong communication, problem\\-solving, and teamwork skills.
* Passion for full\\-stack development and a desire to learn new technologies.



**Benefits** 



* **Stipend:** 
 ‚Çπ7,500 \\- ‚Çπ15,000 (Performance\\-Based) (Paid)
* Hands\\-on experience working on real\\-world full\\-stack development projects.
* **Certificate of Internship** 
 \\&
 **Letter of Recommendation** 
 upon completion.
* Build a strong professional portfolio through practical project work.



**Equal Opportunity Statement** 
 Dexter's Tech is an equal\\-opportunity employer and encourages applicants from all backgrounds to apply.

* Design, develop, and maintain applications using C\\+\\+ on Linux platforms.

title: Java Full Stack (Java Backend + React.js) ‚Äì 10+ Years - Any UST Location - Immediate Joiner
description:
Candidates
 **ready to join immediately** 
 can share their details via email for quick processing.
 



 üìå
 **CCTC \\| ECTC \\| Notice Period \\| Location Preference** 




 nitin.patil@ust.com
 



 Act fast for immediate attention! ‚è≥üì©
 



  





 Key Responsibilities
 



 Backend (Java / Spring)
 


* Design and develop backend services using
 **Java 8\\+** 
 and
 **Spring Boot / Spring MVC / Spring Data / Spring Security** 
 .
* Build
 **microservices** 
 with focus on scalability, resilience, observability, and API contract integrity.
* Develop and optimize
 **RESTful APIs** 
 , data\\-processing components, and backend workflows.
* Apply
 **DDD, clean architecture** 
 , design patterns, and secure coding practices.
* Work with
 **RDBMS** 
 (schema design, query optimization, indexing) and exposure to
 **NoSQL** 
 where needed.
* Integrate with messaging/event platforms like
 **Kafka / RabbitMQ** 
 .
* Troubleshoot complex issues around
 **performance, concurrency, JVM tuning** 
 , and distributed systems.



 Frontend (React.js)
 


* Build responsive UI using
 **React.js** 
 ,
 **TypeScript/JavaScript** 
 , and modern component patterns.
* Manage state using
 **Redux / Context API** 
 and integrate UI with backend APIs.
* Ensure UI performance optimization (memoization, lazy loading, code splitting).
* Work with frontend testing tools like
 **Jest / React Testing Library** 
 (preferred).



 DevOps / Delivery
 


* Implement CI/CD using
 **Jenkins / GitLab CI / GitHub Actions** 
 .
* Containerize services with
 **Docker** 
 and deploy using
 **Kubernetes** 
 .
* Work with cloud platforms (preferably
 **Azure** 
 , AWS acceptable).
* Participate in code reviews, mentor engineers, and support production releases.



 Required Skills
 


* **10\\+ years** 
 overall experience in software engineering with strong
 **Java backend** 
 depth.
* Strong in
 **Core Java** 
 , Collections, Concurrency, JVM fundamentals.
* Strong hands\\-on in

 .

 and distributed system patterns.

 **React.js** 
 with
 **TypeScript/JavaScript** 
 .
* Strong knowledge of
 **REST APIs** 
 , authentication/authorization (OAuth2/JWT).
* Strong
 **SQL** 
 skills and performance tuning experience.
* Messaging/event\\-driven experience (
 **Kafka preferred** 
 ).
* Hands\\-on with
 **Docker, Kubernetes** 
 , CI/CD pipelines.
* Good communication, ownership, and ability to drive technical discussions.



 Good to Have
 


* GraphQL, WebSockets
* Observability tools (ELK, Prometheus/Grafana, Datadog/New Relic)
* API gateway/service mesh experience
* Agile/Scrum experience



 Soft Skills
 


* Lead design discussions, make architecture decisions, guide teams.
* Strong collaboration across product, QA, DevOps, and business teams.
* Ownership mindset and delivery focus.

title: Project Engineer trainee
description:
**Company Description**

 PInterview is an innovative online platform dedicated to revolutionizing the way individuals prepare for interviews. By offering online mock interviews with industry professionals, PInterview helps students and professionals enhance their interview skills through live video or telephonic sessions. The platform aims to reshape the preparation process, empowering tomorrow's leaders with top\\-notch career consulting services from global industry experts.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time on\\-site role for an Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Consultant based in Bengaluru. The ERP Consultant will be responsible for analyzing business processes, implementing ERP solutions, and providing finance\\-related consulting. This role involves conducting needs assessments, configuring ERP software, training users, and ensuring seamless ERP integrations to optimize organizational efficiency.
   




**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in Business Process analysis and implementation
* Strong Analytical Skills and problem\\-solving abilities
* Experience in ERP Implementations and Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) solutions
* Knowledge of finance and financial processes within ERP systems
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
* Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment
* Prior experience in a consulting role is a plus
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Business, Finance, Information Systems, or a related field

title: Custom Software Engineer
description:

 Finastra Fusion Loan IQ
   

  

**Good to have skills :** 
 Java, Spring Boot

 15 years full time education
   

  

 Summary: As an Application Lead, you will lead the effort to design, build, and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact. Your day will involve overseeing the application development process and ensuring seamless communication within the team and stakeholders. Roles \\& Responsibilities: \\- Expected to be an SME \\- Collaborate and manage the team to perform \\- Responsible for team decisions \\- Engage with multiple teams and contribute on key decisions \\- Provide solutions to problems for their immediate team and across multiple teams \\- Lead the application development process effectively \\- Ensure seamless communication within the team and stakeholders Professional \\& Technical Skills: \\- Must have Skills : Finastra Fusion Loan IQ \\- Good to Have Skills : Spring Application Framework, Microservices and Light Weight Architecture \\- Integrate Loan IQ with Market data applications and client‚Äôs proprietary software applications using Spring related frameworks \\- Perform Analysis, design, code, unit test and deployment in Loan IQ SDK, and ensure that interfaces are working fine \\- Develop and maintain batch report files from Loan IQ for Loan Operations, Treasury etc, \\- Assess the impact of changes on existing business and technology processes, as well as other interfacing systems Technical Experience : \\- 5\\+ years of sound experience in Loan IQ SDK, Loan IQ functionality, Java, Spring related frameworks Good to know Spring Boot and Microservices \\- Expertise in designing and developing the interface programs for different integrating applications Batch, Web Services, JMS etc, \\- Must have good Knowledge on Loan IQ Data Model \\- Good to have Interface Mapping documentation designing experience \\- At least, 1 RDBMS experience is required Oracle/MS\\-SQL/IBM DB2 \\- Good communication skills \\- Good analytical skills Additional Information: \\- The candidate should have a minimum of 7\\.5 years of experience in Finastra Fusion Loan IQ \\- This position is based at our Bengaluru office \\- A 15 years full\\-time education is required, 15 years full time education

title: Custom Software Engineer
description:
**Project Role :** 
 Custom Software Engineer
   

  

**Project Role Description :** 
 Design, build and configure applications to meet business process and application requirements.
   

  

**Must have skills :** 
 Salesforce Lightning Web Components
   

  

**Good to have skills :** 
 Salesforce Service Cloud
   

  

**Minimum 3 Year(s) Of Experience Is Required**
**Educational Qualification :** 
 15 years full time education
   

  

 Summary: As a Custom Software Engineer, you will engage in the design, construction, and configuration of applications tailored to meet specific business processes and application requirements. Your typical day will involve collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to gather requirements, developing innovative solutions, and ensuring that applications are optimized for performance and user experience. You will also participate in code reviews and contribute to the continuous improvement of development practices, ensuring that the applications you create align with the latest industry standards and best practices. Roles \\& Responsibilities: \\- Expected to perform independently and become an SME. \\- Required active participation/contribution in team discussions. \\- Contribute in providing solutions to work related problems. \\- Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements for application development. \\- Participate in code reviews to ensure quality and adherence to best practices. Professional \\& Technical Skills: \\- Must To Have Skills: Proficiency in Salesforce Lightning Web Components. \\- Experience with Salesforce Service Cloud. \\- Strong understanding of web development principles and frameworks. \\- Familiarity with Agile development methodologies. \\- Ability to troubleshoot and resolve application issues efficiently. Additional Information: \\- The candidate should have minimum 3 years of experience in Salesforce Lightning Web Components. \\- This position is based at our Pune office. \\- A 15 years full time education is required., 15 years full time education

title: Custom Software Engineer
description:
**Project Role :** 
 Custom Software Engineer
   

  

**Project Role Description :** 
 Develop and configure software systems either end\\-to\\-end or for a specific stage of product lifecycle. Apply knowledge of technologies, applications, methodologies, processes and tools to support a client, project or entity.
   

  

**Must have skills :** 
 Spring Boot
   

  

**Good to have skills :** 
 NA
   

  

**Minimum 3 Year(s) Of Experience Is Required**
**Educational Qualification :** 
 15 years full time education
   

  

 Summary: As a Custom Software Engineer, you will engage in the development and configuration of software systems, either managing the entire process or focusing on specific stages of the product lifecycle. Your day will involve collaborating with team members to apply your knowledge of various technologies and methodologies, ensuring that the software solutions meet client needs and project requirements. You will also be responsible for troubleshooting issues and implementing enhancements to improve system performance and user experience. Roles \\& Responsibilities: \\- Expected to perform independently and become an SME. \\- Required active participation/contribution in team discussions. \\- Contribute in providing solutions to work related problems. \\- Assist in the design and architecture of software systems to ensure scalability and maintainability. \\- Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications. Professional \\& Technical Skills: \\- Must To Have Skills: Proficiency in Spring Boot. \\- Strong understanding of RESTful web services and microservices architecture. \\- Experience with database technologies such as MySQL or PostgreSQL. \\- Familiarity with front\\-end technologies like Angular or React. \\- Knowledge of version control systems, particularly Git. Additional Information: \\- The candidate should have minimum 3 years of experience in Spring Boot. \\- This position is based at our Gurugram office. \\- A 15 years full time education is required., 15 years full time education

 Summary: We are looking for a skilled Python Developer with hands\\-on experience in Generative AI to join our growing AI/ML team. The ideal candidate will have strong programming skills in Python, a solid understanding of machine learning fundamentals, and experience working with state\\-of\\-the\\-art Generative AI models (such as GPT, LLaMA, Stable Diffusion, etc.). You will be responsible for developing, integrating, and optimizing GenAI\\-powered solutions for real\\-world applications. Roles \\& Responsibilities: \\- Design, develop, and maintain scalable Python applications for Generative AI use cases. \\- Integrate and fine\\-tune large language models (LLMs) or diffusion models for business needs. \\- Build APIs and pipelines for model deployment and interaction. \\- Collaborate with data scientists, ML engineers, and product teams to identify AI opportunities. \\- Conduct experiments, benchmarking, and performance tuning of models. \\- Ensure responsible AI use by applying safety, fairness, and bias\\-mitigation techniques. \\- Stay updated with the latest advancements in GenAI, LLMs, and foundational models. Professional \\& Technical Skills: \\- Must To Have Skills: Proficiency in Python (Programming Language). \\- Good To Have Skills: Experience with Machine Learning. \\- Strong understanding of application design principles and methodologies. \\- Experience with software development life cycle and agile methodologies. \\- Familiarity with version control systems such as Git. Additional Information: \\- The candidate should have minimum 6 years of experience in Python (Programming Language). \\- This position is based at our Bengaluru office. \\- A 15 years full time education is required., 15 years full time education
